scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:renderer && npm run copy:html
scripts.dev: npm run copy:html && npm run build:main && npm run build:renderer && concurrently "tsc -p tsconfig.main.json -w" "esbuild src/renderer/main.ts --bundle --format=esm --outfile=dist/renderer/main.js --platform=browser --target=es2020 --sourcemap --watch" "npm run watch:html" "wait-on dist/main/index.js && electron ."
